title: TOMATO BASIL GNOCCHI SOUP
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium-low heat.
Add the onions saute for about 8-10 minutes, until very tender.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the tomatoes, sugar, vegetable broth, and basil leaves.
Season with salt and pepper and bring the soup to a boil.
Lower the heat, and simmer, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes, until the tomatoes are very tender.
Remove from heat and use a immersion blender to puree the soup until creamy.
In the meanwhile, cook gnocchi according to the recipe or package instruction.
Add gnocchi to the tomato basil basil and serve it warm.
ingredients: about 16 oz gnocchi, uncooked (homemade or storebought)
